column111:
"dc.description": "The present invention relates to a method for managing schedules from natural language memo sentences that can be managed by recognizing natural language memo sentences input by a user.
   
   
    The schedule management method from the natural language memo sentence of the present invention is a natural language memo sentence input by the user in the agent system consisting of an interface agent responsible for input and output to the user
column112: a plurality of application agents responsible for the application and the corresponding application programs. A method of managing a schedule by processing the information
column113: comprising: extracting information from a natural language sentence input by a user in the natural language processing portion of the interface agent to construct a generic template
column114: which is a general-purpose information structure
column115: and selecting the application agent in the dispatcher portion Delivering a generic template to the agent; A schedule agent
